DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare improvement ankle control brain activation subject stroke result two different form telerehabilitation : tracking training , emphasize accurate movement , versus movement training , involve simple movement . Hypotheses : 1 . The Track group show great improvement ankle range motion compare Move group . 2 . The Track group show great improvement ankle track accuracy great change fMRI ( increase relative volume activation ipsilesional sensorimotor cortex , increase laterality index , decrease blood-oxygen-level-dependent ( BOLD ) signal intensity index ) compare Move group . 3 . The Track group show great improvement track accuracy untrained joint ( knee ) compare Move group . 4 . The Track group show great improvement stand balance . 5 . The Track group show great improvement walk speed ankle dorsiflexion gait compare Move group .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Single stroke ischemic infarct . 2 . Between 18 85 year age . 3 . Time since stroke onset must > 6 month . 4 . Can receive rehabilitation therapy . 5 . Impaired ankle dorsiflexion/plantarflexion least 10 degree active motion . 6 . Cognition level must least 24 30 MiniMental Examination 7 . Able ambulate least 100 foot independently . training . 1 . Can neuromuscular disorder stroke impairs ankle motion . 2 . Can executive function score Stroop Interference Test < 37 . 3 . Can score Beck Depression Inventory > 10 . 4 . Can ataxia , apraxia , receptive aphasia , hemineglect , severe visual field cut . 5 . Can pregnant indwell metal medical device incompatible fMRI .
